org.jruyi.core

Interface ITcpConnPoolConfiguration

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ITcpClientConfiguration

    public interface ITcpConnPoolConfiguration
extends ITcpClientConfiguration
    This interface defines methods to configure a TCP client of type ConnPool or MuxConnPool.
    Since:
    2.2

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int idleTimeoutInSeconds()
      Returns the timeout in seconds for idle connections.
      ITcpConnPoolConfiguration idleTimeoutInSeconds(int idleTimeoutInSeconds)
      Sets the timeout in seconds for idle connections.
      int maxPoolSize()
      Returns the maximum size of the connection pool.
      ITcpConnPoolConfiguration maxPoolSize(int maxPoolSize)
      Sets the maximum size of the connection pool.
      int minPoolSize()
      Returns the minimum size of the connection pool.
      ITcpConnPoolConfiguration minPoolSize(int minPoolSize)
      Sets the minimum size of the connection pool.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.jruyi.core.ITcpClientConfiguration

    • Method Detail

      • idleTimeoutInSeconds

        int idleTimeoutInSeconds()
        Returns the timeout in seconds for idle connections.
        Returns:
        the idle timeout in seconds

      • idleTimeoutInSeconds

        ITcpConnPoolConfiguration idleTimeoutInSeconds(int idleTimeoutInSeconds)
        Sets the timeout in seconds for idle connections. Sets 0 to not allow idle connections. Sets -1 to never time out.
        Parameters:
        idleTimeoutInSeconds - the idle timeout in seconds to set
        Returns:
        this configuration
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified idleTimeoutInSeconds is less than -1

      • minPoolSize

        int minPoolSize()
        Returns the minimum size of the connection pool.
        Returns:
        the minimum size of the connection pool

      • minPoolSize

        ITcpConnPoolConfiguration minPoolSize(int minPoolSize)
        Sets the minimum size of the connection pool.
        Parameters:
        minPoolSize - the minimum pool size to set
        Returns:
        this configuration
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified minPoolSize is negative

      • maxPoolSize

        int maxPoolSize()
        Returns the maximum size of the connection pool.
        Returns:
        the maximum size of the connection pool

      • maxPoolSize

        ITcpConnPoolConfiguration maxPoolSize(int maxPoolSize)
        Sets the maximum size of the connection pool.
        Parameters:
        maxPoolSize - the maximum pool size to set
        Returns:
        this configuration
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified maxPoolSize is less than 1
